page.title: 01Welling and Blackfen
page.content: Most of the area is in Bexley London Borough,but the western edge is in Greenwich.It is 10 miles to London,and is typical 1930's suburbia,with many semi-detached houses.People travel into London by car or train. There are many facilities such as supermarkets,restaurants,churches, parks,sports centre,swimming pool,Bingo club,social clubs,etc. Danson Park is the biggest landscaped park in Bexley. Many people know Shooters Hill-the highest point in south-east London.Over the top of the hill runs Shooters Hill Road,an old Roman road which went from London to North Kent. It is very busy with cars commuting to London,and new roads are planned to ease congestion.
